alert.note: Alert for Stanley (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 10:53AM MDT until September 07 at 11:15AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 AM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN STANLEY COUNTY... At 1051 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Wendte, or 17 miles west of Fort Pierre, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 1132 AM CDT, half dollar size hail was reported 7 miles southeast of Hayes. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Chantier Creek Recreation Area. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Aberdeen.
